name: Galiciencia 2019
description: Galiciencia celebrated its edition dedicated to health and good habits with an absolute record number of projects submitted

name: Workshop: Digital worlds
description: We share our life life with the unknown through the internet and this implies risks. Do you know what cookies are? Besides being delicious cookies, they are pieces of data. When you accept them, they personalize your Internet browsing, but also put your privacy at risk.

name: Don Bosco Awards XXXII - Jury's decision
description: Among the twelve prizes awarded in the Health Sciences research area was a project called Baby Safety, which develops systems for the prevention of sudden infant death. The students belong to Aulas Tecnópole de Orense and explained that the design includes four devices that can be integrated into the baby's crib and clothing to monitor its position, temperature and pulse while it sleeps. With these systems they reduce the probability of a newborn suffering sudden death.

name: Don Bosco XXXII - Winners
description: Among the twelve prizes awarded in the Health Sciences research area was a project called Baby Safety, which develops systems for the prevention of sudden infant death. The students belong to Aulas Tecnópole de Orense and explained that the design includes four devices that can be integrated into the baby's crib and clothing to monitor its position, temperature and pulse while it sleeps. With these systems they reduce the probability of a newborn suffering sudden death.

name: A system against sudden infant death, among the Don Bosco awards
description: Among the twelve prizes awarded in the Health Sciences research area was a project called Baby Safety, which develops systems for the prevention of sudden infant death. The students belong to Aulas Tecnópole de Orense and explained that the design includes four devices that can be integrated into the baby's crib and clothing to monitor its position, temperature and pulse while it sleeps. With these systems they reduce the probability of a newborn suffering sudden death.

name: Lorenzo Albaladejo Martínez's Post
description: "Knowing and being able to talk to people like Diego Enrique Fontán Lorenzo and corroborate that fighting ALWAYS pays off. Delighted that you are part of our team, a multidisciplinary team that Luisa Fernanda Yágüez Ariza, Jero Garcia and I have the pleasure and pride to lead with one goal: to fight against violence and discrimination in children and adolescents. Thank you very much for joining us!"
- Lorenzo Albaladejo (Paralympic Athlete)

name: Galiciencia 2018
description: Galiciencia held its first Spring edition with "Climate Change" as main theme. My role was as a teacher, doing a workshop entitled "Climate Change Challenge".

name: Efer 438: Galiciencia Edition (Spotify)
description: Efervesciencia recorded in Tecnópole (San Cibrán da Viñas) to know first hand the 13th edition of the Galiciencia Science Fair. Sabela Bouzo, Antonio Gregorio, Ana Otero, Tino Álvarez, David Ballesteros, Iria Ollero and Kike Fontán were present.

name: Efer 438: Galiciencia Edition (Google Podcasts)
description: Efervesciencia recorded in Tecnópole (San Cibrán da Viñas) to know first hand the 13th edition of the Galiciencia Science Fair. Sabela Bouzo, Antonio Gregorio, Ana Otero, Tino Álvarez, David Ballesteros, Iria Ollero and Kike Fontán were present.

name: Efer 438: Galiciencia Edition (Podcast Addict)
description: Efervesciencia recorded in Tecnópole (San Cibrán da Viñas) to know first hand the 13th edition of the Galiciencia Science Fair. Sabela Bouzo, Antonio Gregorio, Ana Otero, Tino Álvarez, David Ballesteros, Iria Ollero and Kike Fontán were present.

name: Efer 438: Galiciencia Edition (Spreaker)
description: Efervesciencia recorded in Tecnópole (San Cibrán da Viñas) to know first hand the 13th edition of the Galiciencia Science Fair. Sabela Bouzo, Antonio Gregorio, Ana Otero, Tino Álvarez, David Ballesteros, Iria Ollero and Kike Fontán were present.

name: Several prizes in the 'Hack For Good' contest
description: Fontán participated at the University of Vigo in the 'Hack For Good' contest (organized by Telefónica). He won prizes on three occasions. "I think the first time was a second prize of about 600 euros, with a project to treat phobias through virtual reality," says Fontán.

name: So young and a 'hacker'
description: This young 21-year-old from Vigo is already making his first steps in computer security and has just designed the application that will be launched this year by the jury of the Galiciencia science competition.

name: A high-tech jury without paper
description: Innovation... The app designed by Kike Fontán. The 40 members of the jury had a new tool to evaluate the projects during the competition: a mobile application.

name: Galiciencia 2017
description: Kike, who participated in Galiciencia a few years ago and came back to give a workshop, discovered: How many stars did you see when you were born?

Before it was easy to sow confusion, but today everything is accurately recorded thanks to technology. For example, if you want to know exactly what the sky was like and which stars and planets could be seen from your house on the day of your birth.

name: Workshop: Computers vs Internet
description: Kike, who participated in Galiciencia a few years ago and came back to give a workshop, discovered: How many stars did you see when you were born?

Before it was easy to sow confusion, but today everything is accurately recorded thanks to technology. For example, if you want to know exactly what the sky was like and which stars and planets could be seen from your house on the day of your birth.

name: Two projects from Vigo compete in Madrid (Digital)
description: Two projects of university students from Vigo were classified to enter the first phase of the Telefónica Think Big project in which 126 groups from all over Spain are participating. They are "Social defender" and "Compress to live".

name: Two projects from Vigo compete in Madrid (Paper)
description: Two projects of university students from Vigo were classified to enter the first phase of the Telefónica Think Big project in which 126 groups from all over Spain are participating. They are "Social defender" and "Compress to live".

name: App detects cyber bullyng
description: A parent will be able to know instantly if their child is being bullied thanks to the Social Defender project.

name: Social Defender, the Galician solution against school bullying
description: Among the Galician ideas, Social Defender stands out, created by Ahmed Anadi and Diego Fontán, a tool that monitors social networks in real time to detect cases of bullying and abuse by a user or group of users against another person. Through a mobile phone alert system, the user can know if he/she has been insulted, even without being mentioned.

name: Hacker contest rewards TIR
description: During Hack4Good, the second award went to the TIR project, a support system for people suffering from some kind of phobia through a safe and controlled virtual reality environment and with the aim that the user can overcome the stress caused by certain situations.

name: Hackers with good vibes
description: The Hack4Good started at University of Vigo trying to build a better world. My role was as co-creator of a project called TIR (later known as TYR), focused on the treatment of phobias through Virtual Reality.

name: Galiciencia 2014
description: Galiciencia reached its ninth edition with a wide range of activities parallel to the exhibition of projects that included the commemoration of the International Year of Crystallography and Family Farming and the Year of Biotechnology in Spain.

name: Galiciencia 2012
description: Galiciencia is a science fair that takes place in Galicia. During its seventh edition, my project presented was an application focused on innovating school lessons through the use of Augmented Reality.
